alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 5:29PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hendry and Glades Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Venus, or 12 miles north of Palmdale, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Labelle, Moore Haven, Lakeport, Palmdale, Port La Belle, Brighton Seminole Reservation, Ortona, Muse and Lake Hicpochee. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
